thread.title: Mother shocked son in ICU after a month in jail
thread.title_full: Mother shocked son in ICU after a month in jail

title: Mother shocked son in ICU after a month in jail
text:
More 
A mother is shocked her son, who went into prison a healthy man, has been hospitalised after under a month in incarceration . 
Prisoner Chandran Muniandy was admitted to the ICU unit of Seberang Jaya government hospital on February 8 for serious head and leg injuries. 
Chandran is an odd-job contract labourer from Kampung Sungei Jawi, Penang.
